rules_text: Target permanent gains hexproof until end of turn. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it this turn.
flavor_text:
[i]“This ship has seen the fiercest storms, 
and yet we sail with pride.
Through calm or gale, we'll never fail, 
to brave the open tide.”
—[/i]Onward We Sail[i], Edgeseeker shanty[/i]
